author: mandrenguyen
body:
#### PR description:

Introduces a process modifier for reprocessing 2018 PbPb miniAOD, as requested by @clacaputo 
This PR includes the bugfix requested in #37913, which fixes an issue in the jet UE subtraction used in heavy ions.  It could also be expanded to include #37907. 



#### PR validation:

This process modifier is active in workflows 140.5611 (data) and 158.01 (MC)

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

This PR contains a backport of #36489 and is intended for a partial reprocessing of the 2018 PbPb miniAOD, as discussed in #37841

@FHead 


Before submitting your pull requests, make sure you followed this checklist:
- verify that the PR is really intended for the chosen branch
- verify that changes follow [CMS Naming, Coding, And Style Rules](http://cms-sw.github.io/cms_coding_rules.html)
- verify that the PR passes the basic test procedure suggested in the [CMSSW PR instructions](https://cms-sw.github.io/PRWorkflow.html)
title: Process modifier for 2018 PbPb miniAOD reprocessing
